about_the_game:
Prepare for an electrifying gaming experience in "Drifting Car Stunter!" This heart-pounding game combines high-speed stunts with precision drifting, delivering a unique and thrilling gameplay adventure. Choose your dream car, personalize it to match your style, and embark on a journey through a world of challenging tracks and gravity-defying tricks. With multiple difficulty levels, including the daunting Hell mode, "Drifting Car Stunter" promises hours of adrenaline-fueled fun. Can you conquer the stunts, earn achievements, and become a legend in the world of extreme car stunts?

In "Drifting Car Stunter," the excitement goes beyond the rush of high-speed stunts and drifts. Achievements add an extra layer of challenge and satisfaction, encouraging players to push their limits and showcase their skills. Embark on the quest to unlock a variety of achievements, each with its unique goal, from executing mind-blowing stunts to mastering precision drifting and exploring hidden tracks. Whether you're levitating, defying gravity, or racing against the clock, there's an achievement waiting to be conquered.

Customize your car with various colors and make it uniquely yours. Prove your mettle on tracks that range from Easy to Hard, with checkpoints and safety bars to keep you on track, or dare to enter the unforgiving Hell mode where there are no second chances. Can you become the ultimate Drifting Car Stunter by collecting achievements, mastering the art of precision driving, and conquering the most challenging tracks?

"Drifting Car Stunter" offers a heart-pounding, visually stunning, and immersive experience that will keep you coming back for more. Get ready to burn rubber, perform jaw-dropping stunts, and race against time in a quest to dominate the world of extreme car stunts. The road is open, the challenges are limitless, and the achievements await. Strap in and get ready for the ride of a lifetime!

name: Drifting Car Stunter

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 960
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 8700K
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GTX 1070
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

This heart-pounding game combines high-speed stunts with precision drifting, delivering a unique and thrilling gameplay adventure. Embark on a journey through a world of challenging tracks and gravity-defying tricks.
